allow:
Bash(git tag -a v2.20.4 -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Release v2.20.4 - Fix HVAC mode display bug

Fix: Check actual power state before returning optimistic HVAC mode

Fixes issue where climate card shows "Fan Only" when AC is physically off (pow=0).

Changes:
- climate.py: Reorder hvac_mode property to check pow=0 BEFORE optimistic state
- This prevents stale optimistic values from masking actual device off state

Issue Details:
When AC turns off (pow=0), Home Assistant would show the last optimistic
HVAC mode (e.g., "Fan Only") instead of "Off" because the optimistic state was
checked before the actual device power state.

Solution:
Always check device.values[''pow''] first. If pow=0, immediately return
HVACMode.OFF regardless of any optimistic state values.
EOF
)")
